content: **welcome to the unhinged christmas blanket cal ** i decided very last minute to put together an interlocking crochet christmas blanket full of the kind of holiday cheer your conservative christian parents definitely won t approve of **content warning ** this cal will include adult humor irreverent themes profanity sexual innuendo and rated-r holiday nonsense if you want a wholesome hallmark-movie blanket this is not that if you want to laugh this is absolutely that using a 5 mm hook and worsted weight yarn the final blanket will be approximately 5 ft by 5 ft this listing is for the december 7 2025 square i <3 snow but fuck ice this square is available for free i do not feel comfortable ethically charging for it if you are interested in other squares please check out my shop or consider buying the unhinged christmas blanket cal for more patterns at a steep discount new squares release daily between december 1 25 around 5ish pm cst or maybe earlier i know previously i said before 5 but life happens **if you purchase the complete cal** optional joining instructions will be added on december 25 bonus squares only available in the cal *if you have a sense of humor or want to piss off your relatives you re in the right place *
